title: NoClassDefFoundError: org/springframework/data/domain/Limit when Upgrading to 3.12.0.CR1

labels.name: area/spring
labels.description: Issues relating to the Spring integration

body:
### Describe the bug

When I upgraded my example project to 3.12.0.CR1, the spring project is failed due to the following exceptions:
 
```bash
2024-06-16 07:12:57,834 ERROR [io.und.req.io] (executor-thread-1) Exception handling request 40b25364-992a-469a-b847-4ccee00aa61c-1 to /posts: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/springframework/data/domain/Limit

	at io.undertow.servlet.handlers.ServletInitialHandler.handleFirstRequest(ServletInitialHandler.java:247)

	at io.undertow.servlet.handlers.ServletInitialHandler$2.call(ServletInitialHandler.java:108)
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.ServletRequestContextThreadSetupAction$1.call(ServletRequestContextThreadSetupAction.java:48)

```

### Expected behavior

Should work as before.

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

The example project is here: https://github.com/hantsy/quarkus-sandbox/tree/master/spring

Check the build info stack:

https://github.com/hantsy/quarkus-sandbox/actions/runs/9534187346/job/26278326289

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10

### Output of `java -version`

21

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.12.0.CR1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven

### Additional information

_No response_
